item.title: About
item.description: Analyst / R Developer at Transport for London. Trying to understand how cities work, and making them work a bit better for everyone in the process. Interested in sharing and supporting opinionated analysis and humane, ethical applications of machine learning. With the rest of the time, I buy/play dusty records and watch The Breakfast Club (the radio one) and Hot 97 a bit too much.
